DOC.brief_summary: This study do find experience woman vaginal reconstruction . We hope learn quality life , sexual function , body image . We would like find happy woman surgery . We also want know thing change improve . Since surgery , would like ask take part interview .
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Vaginal Reconstruction After Oncologic Resection : Surgical Outcomes , Patient Satisfaction Sexual Function
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study , entitle immediate vaginal reconstruction follow oncologic resection : Surgical outcome , patient satisfaction sexual function determine postoperative complication , patient satisfaction , quality life level sexual functioning among patient undergone vaginal reconstruction follow tumor resection and/or pelvic exenteration.This study three component : 1 ) chart review determine postoperative complication anatomic characteristic neo-vagina , 2 ) postoperative questionnaire consist validated survey instrument assess quality life , body image sexual function 3 ) postoperative qualitative interview examine quality life vaginal reconstruction .
DOC.criteria: Immediate partial total vaginal reconstruction myocutaneous fasciocutaneous flap , follow pelvic exenteration tumor resection MSKCC study period January 1 , 1993 , March 30 , 2007 .
